hero.title: Master

curriculum.title: What You'll
curriculum.description: Master momentum trading with clarity. Mentix Trading teaches a structured, repeatable process using POI (OB & FVG, supply & demand), market structure, and liquidity to build precision, confidence, and consistency in every trade.

modules.title: Market Mechanics
modules.description: Understand how markets truly move through order flow and volume analysis.

modules.title: Consistency Profitable
modules.description: Learn how to be a consistent profitable trader â€” long term profitable.

modules.title: PropFirm & Funded Acc

modules.title: POI Identification
modules.description: Identify high-probability Points of Interest using OB, FVG, and supply & demand zones.

modules.title: Risk Management
modules.description: Develop a professional risk framework to protect and grow your capital.

modules.title: Trade Execution
modules.description: Build a repeatable execution plan with clear rules and journaling practices.

whatsIncluded.title: What's
whatsIncluded.description: Everything you need to become a consistently profitable trader.

items.description: In-depth recorded lessons covering every aspect of POI (OB & FVG, supply & demand), market structure, and liquidity trading.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Mentix Trading

items.question: How can Mentix Trading help me achieve consistent profits?
items.answer: With expert strategies, real-time coaching, and a supportive community, we simplify momentum trading for sustainable results.

items.question: What makes Mentix Trading different from other communities?
items.answer: We offer structured trading models, live sessions, and direct access to experts who've helped thousands of traders succeed.

items.question: Is Mentix Trading suitable for beginners?
items.answer: Yes! We simplify complex strategies into clear steps, guiding you from beginner to consistent trader.

items.question: How does Mentix Trading support funded traders?
items.answer: We offer continuous feedback and coaching to help you secure funding, stay disciplined, and scale your trading.

items.question: How does the community support my trading journey?
items.answer: Our active community shares insights, strategies, and real-time feedback to keep you motivated and on track.

footer.description: Master trading with expert guidance and proven strategies.

coaching.title: 1-on-1
coaching.description: Get direct, personalized guidance from an expert trader. Weekly live Zoom sessions, custom strategies tailored to your goals, and ongoing support to fast-track your path to consistency.
coaching.whyDescription: Unlike group courses, our 1-on-1 coaching is tailored entirely to you. Your trading style, your weaknesses, your goals.

whyItems.title: Personalized Strategy
whyItems.description: Get a trading strategy built specifically around your strengths, schedule, and risk tolerance.

whyItems.title: Weekly Live Sessions
whyItems.description: 6 months of weekly 1-on-1 Zoom sessions with direct feedback on your trades and chart analysis.

whyItems.title: Funded Account Strategy
whyItems.description: A proven step-by-step strategy to pass prop firm challenges and manage funded accounts.

whyItems.title: Lifetime Access
whyItems.description: Full access to 50+ video lessons, trading playbook, templates, and private Discord & Telegram communities forever.
